backend/main.mo: Motoko canister defining resume data types, access control, recruiter visit logging, visitor messages, skills, content storage, and user profile methods with password- and role-gated operations.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing required frontend and backend changes related to password-gated owner panel operations and authorization fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing prewritten 1–2 sentence summaries for all major frontend source files.
frontend/.env.hatem23: Environment variables configuring the Hatem23 deployment’s app name and owner name.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base layer with OKLCH color tokens and dark mode variables applied globally.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that sets the page title to Hatem23 and loads the React app root and main script.
frontend/README-Hatem23-deployment.md: Documentation describing environment variables, build steps, backend separation, and deployment behavior for the Hatem23 clone.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that loads backend content, enforces recruiter prompt, renders all resume sections, and manages the owner panel modal.
frontend/src/appConfig.ts: Exports deployment-specific app configuration derived from environment variables with fallbacks.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Certi: UI component for adding, editing, expanding, and deleting certification entries with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Conte: Main editor for website content, loading data, managing draft state, and saving updates across multiple sub-editors.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Educa: Editor component that allows adding, modifying, expanding, and removing education items with delete confirmation.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Exper: Handles creation, editing, expansion, and deletion of job experience entries with confirmation dialogs.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Hobbi: Simple interface for listing, adding, and deleting hobby strings with confirmation prompts.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Owner: Controls password-gated access to owner tools and navigation between administrative views like content editing and visitor data.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Proje: UI for adding, editing, expanding, and deleting projects within owner content.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Recru: Displays recruiter visit logs with options to clear all and handles loading and auth errors.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Skill: Manages adding, editing, deleting, and clearing skill entries with backend mutations.
frontend/src/components/OwnerPanel/Visit: Shows visitor messages sorted by timestamp with support for clearing and error handling.
Public-facing project list with expandable details and optional external links.
frontend/src/components/RecruiterPromptM: Modal asking visitors if they're recruiters and logs visit metadata before proceeding.
frontend/src/components/Section.tsx: Animated section wrapper using IntersectionObserver to reveal content on scroll.
frontend/src/components/TopNav.tsx: Fixed top navigation that highlights active section and supports smooth scrolling.
frontend/src/components/VisitorMessageFo: Contact form that submits visitor messages via backend actor and shows success feedback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous backend actor and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuth.ts: Hook to check if the current caller is an admin using the backend actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useContent.ts: Hooks to fetch and update site content through the backend actor with password protection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Hooks for secret messages (placeholder) and skill management with backend password-protected mutations.
frontend/src/hooks/useRecruiterVisit.ts: Hooks to log recruiter visits and manage recruiter visit records via authenticated actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useVisitorMessages.ts: Hooks to submit, fetch, and clear visitor messages with backend integration.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS config with custom color variables, dark mode settings, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity provider before rendering the app.
frontend/src/resumeContent.ts: Exports a structured resume content object containing hero info, education, experience entries, skills, and certifications used to populate the resume site.
frontend/src/utils/ownerAccess.ts: Empty placeholder file for owner-access utilities.
frontend/src/utils/ownerPanelAccess.ts: Defines and exports the hardcoded owner panel password used for admin access.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter cleanup.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures TailwindCSS with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Holds the project’s specification, architecture notes, known issues, and existing features for the resume site clone named Hatem23.
